post.body: first commute of 2009 (happy new year btw) and it snows! ... Gotta love the thin end of that bell curve!
Is looking for a low system spec mmo that runs on Linux and will work on my EeePC 900 .... anyone got any ideas / recommendations? Thanks!
EeePC 900 + Mandriva Linux = EVERYTHING works first time, straight from the install, no messing around http://www.mandriva.com ... love it!
PH Back from mad pitching frenzy of the past month ... time to update site, and SL offering ...
SL Conference looking very interesting... http://www.sl-base.com/
EeePC 901 .... Atom processor way faster than 900, and SSD write twice as fast.... no drivers for WIFI/NIC under OpenSuse =(
New laptop - Toshiba Qosmio F50 .... 18.4", Full 1080p HD Display.....and Second Life full screen and fully anti-aliased. =)))
New blog post at http://paleheretic.blogspot.com
is enjoying the positive reaction to his new SL business suit lines!!
looking for Lindens with an interest in (commercial) healthcare projects...
Updating my network on linkedin.com, so if you find a request ... =)
Google Chrome - the ELUA that should kill it dead on day one: http://tinyurl.com/5wn6l7
Am loving my new Nokia E71 ... mini review coming soon...
New blog post - Google ... Where did all the innovation go? over at http://paleheretic.blogspot.com
is trying to cope with the change from 33 degrees in Sardinia to getting soaked on the way to the station in London
